website_summaries.verdict: Most of those who have tried the Saucony Hurricane ISO 3 were positive about its features and what it had to offer in general. Some even thought that its performance was relatively better than the previous ones in the series. But there were others who complained about several of its components, stating that they were not as efficient as expected. Still, the majority of the testers believed that it’s a solid option for those with overpronated foot motion.
pros: Many runners felt that the 3rd version of the Hurricane ISO from Saucony had an overall better performance than its predecessors
The color schemes for this running shoe gained some fans
they welcomed its vibrant hues and shades
The upper fabrics were comfortable to the skin, commented several consumers
Those who needed additional support appreciated the stability mechanics present in this shoe
A reviewer observed that there was a bit more cushioning in the forefoot area compared to version 2 of the Hurricane ISO, and he welcomed it
The outsole unit’s grip capability was lauded by those who have tested it
cons: A number of consumers felt that this shoe’s price was expensive
A tester wrote that though the underfoot foam looked bulky, it wasn’t able to give a springy and responsive ride
The bottom part of the sole unit came apart after a few uses, a runner reported

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, great price, very plush!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes - very plush. My previous Saucony Hurricanes (the Hurricane 16) were a size 10.5W. Amazon recommended that I order a size 11, which I did. (11W) They fit pretty well, so I can only assume that China keeps making them smaller and smaller for a given size. One day I expect I'll wear size 16s and can then join the NBA, make millions, and retire comfortably at age 60...
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorman777Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds. Run slight wide.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of saucony hurricanes. These are a very comfortable shoe. I have plantar fasciitis and these help quite a bit with the pain and give me the control I need to keep my feet from rolling outward while walking (pronating?) I find that the hurricanes run a little on the wide side bc with other brands (new balance, brooks) I have to get wide and with these I don't. These shoes have by far the most cushioning of any shoe I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes, very comfortable for stability shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes, I always have issue trying to find shoes that are 2E wide, and I need shoes that help with moderate pronation, so finding shoes that have a wide 2E are very limited by companies, but these shoes are really really comfortable. These shoes have Plush Cusion inside to help with impact when running or exercising. I purchased another pair of these shoes as they were a really great price from amazon. I recommend these shoes if you are looking for stability shoes, I also love the green color. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan T.

customer_reviews.title: These seem smaller than the prior versions Hurricanes
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in Hurricanes for a long time. These are great, but I think they run a little smaller than the predecessors. I'm 6'2" 205 pounds have rigid 2/3 orthotics and run about 24 miles a week.
customer_reviews.author: MarkM

customer_reviews.title: Flat Narrow Feet
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for someone with flat or somewhat flat feet. I also have narrow feet so take that into consideration. I’ve been running in the ISO Hurricane shoes for about 3 years and have tried at least 3 different versions. To date these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferandDarren

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to running shoes. I purchase these even though Saucony is on to the ISO 4 because they are still great running shoes, in style, and can be found for a fraction of the next iteration. Fit, comfort, stability, everything is great. I have been running in the Hurricanes for years on end and have rarely been disappointed. Last year I ran a few half marathons in these and this year I am training for a marathon in these putting about 200 miles a month on them. These lace up even better than previous versions and the ankle collar and tongue are all improved over last version.
customer_reviews.author: e1up

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs small. I had four pairs of the hurricane iso 2 in size 13 that fit great. When I ordered a size 13 in this years model my toes were touching in the front. Returned and ordered a size 14...they have been working out so far. Other than the sizing issue, the shoe is great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plantar Fasciitis Pain
customer_reviews.text: I was having some terrible plantar fasciitis pain. These shoes feel amazing! Well-cushioned, sock-like fit, good stability, very breathable. Combined with some great excercises I found in The 5 Minute Plantar Faciitis Solution ( and I was feeling great and ready to get back to my regular routine!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Sauconys and I love them
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Sauconys and I love them. I ordered a half size up compared to my New Balance and Adidas and these shoes fit great. These were recommended to me for over - pronation and they help me go further without discomfort when I'm out and about.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE AND SOLVED MY STEP ISSUES.
customer_reviews.text: These light and comfortable. I have pronated steps and you can really tell the difference. I'm probably going to buy a second pair just to have them for the future.
customer_reviews.author: j. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes this is my fourth pair of Hurricane's. Take them out of the box and go, always consistent fit and durable walking jogging style of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Giese

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size larger in the wide width, and I'm very pleased with the fit and comfort of these shoes. I will shop for another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: icount2

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the Hurricane series for a number of years now, and I am consistently happy with them. Very good support and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: tpatt

customer_reviews.title: Very Confortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work and they are comfortable all day long. The right amount of softness.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fits my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide toe box and narrow heel. I have been wearing this model of Saucony for years because it fits perfectly to my feet. The newer version of this shoe is too tight in the toe box and so I prefer this older version.
customer_reviews.author: Mark McNair

customer_reviews.title: I like these even more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I like these even more than I thought I would. After years of running in Saucony Hurricanes, this is the first ISO that I have tried. It fits great. Almost feels like pulling on a sock.
customer_reviews.author: Nevadaflyboy

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been running in the hurricane iso 3 since the year of their release. I have tried the later hurricanes the 4 and 5 but the 3 works best for me. I can only find them online and when I do I will usually buy more than one pair. I have a Nueroma in my left foot and these shoes do not aggravate it like Brooks or ASICS or Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Saucony Hurricane running shoes over the past dozen years. These were the highest price, but the most comfortable Hurricane Iso I have ever bought. I will get them again.
customer_reviews.author: lstotts

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable shoe, not as supportive as other models of Saucony, but thats why i bought others. This shoe is by far the most comfortbale to wear and i'm glad i got it.
customer_reviews.author: FBGTX

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Own another pair of these shoes that I've practically worn out after just six months, but I'm walking/running about 15 miles every week.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Overkamp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very cushiony, esp v. ASICs which used to be my shoe. downside is lace-up is very loose, not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Haas

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting runner.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shoe. Perfect for running and standing and all things athletic.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and are very comfortable on longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I was fitted with this shoe now I only buy it till I can't get it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: David Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This can NOT be authentic saucony hurricane shoes! They felt like a giant marshmallow glued to a stretched out thin sock. Absolutely NO support unlike my previous hurricane running shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chill

customer_reviews.title: Great street running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great street running shoe at a great price...probably my 4th pair...no reason to change when they fit and feel perfect from the moment I lace them up.!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Cran

customer_reviews.title: Consistently Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Hurricanes for years. They always fit right and provide great support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Seagren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Those shoes are great, except for its not good looking ha
customer_reviews.author: chao lu

customer_reviews.title: Quality Decrease
customer_reviews.text: Far less durable than previous models. Inner heal fabric deteriorated in less than 3 months. I have sauconys from 5 years ago in better shape (same socks, same lace pattern, far more miles).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B Oliver

customer_reviews.title: SIZE is not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Saucony Mens's Hurricane for over 25 years and this was the worst model. Extremely too small and painful to wear
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Run 6 miles with these shoes 6 days a week. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel great on my feet. I'm flat footed and the cushioned soles are just right and has the right amount of built in support. I have large feet and it is very hard to find shoes that not only fit but are also comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son likes them, and so far they are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jemma452

customer_reviews.title: Super Cushioned Feel
customer_reviews.text: Bigger former runner with flat feet. I use these for my dog walks and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: garod wayman

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Product was excellent, I just didn’t like the color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Once again a incredibly comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: once you try Saucony you will look down on all the other sneaker manufacturers. Once again a incredibly comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes. Solid support but soft material on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Too small and slips off heel!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe slipped off the back of my heel and the toe box was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Don't machine wash them -- liner fabric and padding will bunch up and cause problems.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this model for years and I would give these shoes five stars except that they didn't hold up so well when I washed them. The fabric inside the back of the shoe bunched up, causing a ridge that rubbed against my heel when running and creating major friction when running. I tried fixing the shoes to no avail and I had to buy another pair. Running shoes should be washable in cold water without damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: Garbanzo

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these Hurricane ISO 3 shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have tended to buy the Hurricane line of running shoes over the years and have been satisfied with them for fitness purposes. My main exercise has been at gyms using aerobic machines and resistance-type machines. These new Hurricanes fit well and seem to facilitate jogging more than my previous Hurricanes did. I am happy with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Saucony shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have run in the previous models and this one continues to provide the expected support and comfort from the Saucony Hurricane. Great for longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: theActiveGuy.com

customer_reviews.title: The shoe does have increased forefoot cushioning (as compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe does have increased forefoot cushioning (as compared to the ISO 2). The lacing system needs to be very tight as the upper support allows more movement when running. Also, limited flexibility in the shoes which should relax after continued wear. Not a significant upgrade from the ISO 2.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Solomon

product_meta.title: Saucony Hurricane Iso 3 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Roads run forever, how about a shoe that allows you to do the same? The Hurricane ISO 3 features ISOFIT that helps lock the foot down, while increased cushioning and lasting stability benefit your long run. All that's left are the miles and an EVERUN continuous cushioning delivering more energy return to get you through more of them. Saucony Hurricane Iso 3 Running Shoes Breathable Upper The Saucony Hurricane Iso 3 running shoe has fantastic breathability due to the upper. Breathing is good whether your a human or a piece of running gear. The materials in this product are designed to move moisture away from the skin, to keep you running dry and comfortable. Equipped with ISOFIT which is an ultra-soft inner sleeve crafted out of stretchable air mesh and morphs to the foot for a sock-like feel. The floating support cage cradles the foot to give maximum support. Everun Midsole Featuring EVERUN construction where the topsole layer positions Saucony's best cushioning material closer to the foot, combining smoother landings in the heel with reduced pressure in the forefoot. It produces a dramatically, livelier and more responsive feel with 83% energy return and it maintains it's properties 3x longer than standard EVAs. The Hurricane Iso 2 provides plush cushioning which provides the up most comfort to the wear. The underfoot feel and amount of impact protection provided by the compressing materials between the foot and running surface. Stability support is given to the Saucony Hurricane as it is engineered for moderate pronation. Pronation is the inward rolling of the ankle through the gait cycle. Equipped with an 8mm offset which is the difference in height between the heel thickness and forefoot thickness of the shoe. The cushioning is distributed more evenly between the heel and the forefoot in shoes with an 8mm offset. Your body stays in a more balanced and comfortable position with every foot strike. Injection Blown Rubber Outsole The outsole is made wit
feature_bullets: Breathable Upper - Allows ventilation throughout the shoe, keeping your feet feeling cool and dry.
ISOFIT - ultra soft inner sleeve which morphs to the foot for a sock-like feel.
EVERUN - Provides cushioning material closer to the foot which produces a dramatically, livelier and more responsive feel.
Floating Support cage - Cradles the foot to give maximum support.
IBR+ - Lightweight, provides cushioning and is strategically placed in the outsole zones where cushioning and response is needed.
